contentType.description: The content type of the file.

filename.description: The filename of the archive object. This should be unique within the manifest. It may include a relative path that points to a subdirectory.

identifier.description: The identifier for the result. This value may *not* be unique if a step is run more than once during a task at different stages.

stepPath.description: The full path to the result if it is within the step history.

deviceTypeIdentifier.description: Specific model identifier of the device.

endDate.description: The timestamp for when the task was ended.

files.description: A list of the files included in this package of results.

rsdFrameworkVersion.description: The version of the SageResearch framework.

schemaIdentifier.description: The identifier for the schema associated with this task result.

schemaRevision.description: The revision for the schema associated with this task result.

startDate.description: The timestamp for when the task was started.

taskIdentifier.description: The Task Identifier for the assessment.

versionString.description: The version string associated with this task.
